summary: This document is a forwarded email containing a British Airways flight reservation confirmation for J. Epstein traveling from London to Cape Town on February 1, 2007. It appears to be a travel booking record showing Epstein's planned international travel.

persons.name: J Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the passenger on a British Airways flight reservation from London to Cape Town.

events.title: Epstein's flight from London to Cape Town
events.description: J. Epstein is booked on British Airways flight BA 43 from London Heathrow to Cape Town International Airport.

keyFacts: J. Epstein had a confirmed British Airways flight reservation from London to Cape Town on February 1, 2007.
The flight was BA 43, departing Heathrow at 4:45 PM and arriving in Cape Town at 6:15 AM on February 2, 2007.
The booking reference appears to be associated with 'Shoppers Travel' based in West Windsor, New Jersey.
Epstein was booked in economy class, seat 26C, on a Boeing 747-400 aircraft.
